fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A recent poll by Survation found that 18% of respondents supported the Liberal Democrats, not 8% as we said (Britain is now a remain nation. We can halt this rush to Brexit, 25 June, page 1, Journal). • Homophone corner? “[Brompton’s e-bikes] … use a battery to make peddling easier” (Brompton aiming to double production on back of e-bike success, 24 June, page 34). • Other recently corrected articles include: Why Corbyn is right to ditch social mobility Chennai in crisis as authorities blamed for dire water shortage Don’t stereotype young remainers. We fear for our futures, not our holidays
